abstract: Wal-Mart Stores, the world’s top retailer, has joined the race to buy Indonesian retailer Matahari’s hypermarket business in a deal worth up to $1 billion, Reuters reported.
snippet: Wal-Mart Stores, the world’s top retailer, has joined the race to buy Indonesian retailer Matahari’s hypermarket business in a deal worth up to $1 billion, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores, the world’s largest retailer, has joined the race to buy the Indonesian retailer Matahari‘s hypermarket business in a deal worth up to $1 billion, Reuters reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Said to Weigh Bid for Matahari Units
